sentence.Network_en: Those five judges up there are not going to sustain any such poppycock idea as this.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里的五位推事,是不会支持象这样胡说八道的主意的.

sentence.Network_en: Politically maybe the idea seems good, but militarily it's poppycock.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种想法在政治上可能看来可取, 但在军事上那是废话一堆.

sentence.Network_en: He dismissed the official explanationas complete poppycock.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为官方的解释是一派胡言,不值一顾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Dutch dialect pappekak, from pap 'soft' + kak 'dung'
